summary: The DanAndPhilGAMES hiatus has officially lasted longer than Kim Kardashian’s marriage to Kris Humphries.
body:
The DanAndPhilGAMES hiatus has officially lasted longer than Kim Kardashian’s marriage to Kris Humphries.

(And fuck off, I don’t watch or support the Kardashians. My sisters however, do - and both of them followed the divorce intensely 🙄)

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: 3k-5k Words Fics (2) Masterlist
body:
Links Last Checked: May 8th, 2019

part one

Absolutely Smitten (I’ll Never Let You Go) - phloridas

Summary: In which Dan is a much-adored primary school music teacher, and Phil is just the science teacher who can’t keep his mind off of him. But when the students notice and try to get in on the action, will Phil finally work up the courage to ask Dan out?

After The Gig (ao3) - librapinof

Summary: The fic where Dan and Phil are lovers from rival bands in England in the 1980’s and they cant get enough of each other after getting home from their gig.

Anocht, Beidh Muid (Tonight, We Will) (ao3) - thereisnobearonthisisland

Summary: When Phil walks into a dingy bar on the outskirts of galway, he’s not sure what to expect - least of all, a beautiful, irish-speaking fiddle player named Dan.

By The Glow Of City Lights - phan-panda

Summary: The stress of the book tour has taken its toll on Phil, and it’s only made more complicated by his ever-growing feelings for Dan. Sometimes all you need is a room with a view and someone to share it with.  

Crash Barriers, Cold Night Air - philsdrill

Summary: It’s a bumpy night on the tour bus for Dan and Phil, and Phil’s feeling a little sick. Through a trip outside to get off the bus, and a reminder of what dinner looked like, Dan takes care of Phil.

Dan’s Purpose - blissedoutphil

Summary: Based on what actual Dan and Phil were saying at 10:59 in Making A Phandwich- Overcooked #2.

Differences - xinyanhowell

Summary: Louise drags Dan out for a night of forced fun, just to get him out of his books and maybe into a cute stranger’s pants for the night…

Familiar Stability (ao3) - symmetricdnp

Summary: He’ll never feel safer than he does curled up with Phil, cut off from the outside world. He remembers when they were younger, when things weren’t yet certain. When a hug was still three hours and a significant lump of pounds away. They had dreamed of spending days in solitude together. Now it’s their reality, seven years running, and it’ll surely be their forever.

Dan and Phil spend Valentine’s Day on the couch.

Flower Petal Wishes - sleeplessnightwithphan

Summary: He loves me not. He loves me not. He loves me not.

Dan has convinced himself that he is worthless, a complete failure, unlovable. He doesn’t understand why this dark haired man is even interested in him. Why he would ever waste his time on him.

Follow The Light - placingglaciers

Summary: In which Dan is “dreaming” and finds someone named Phil who talks with him and guides him to quite a Spectacular Place, but it’s all in question if Dan will truly wake up or not.

I Won’t Give Up (ao3) - knlalla

Summary: Dan and Phil break up because Phil’s tired of the “I’m not gay” attitude Dan puts on in front of his viewers, and Dan tries to fix it.

Joining Up The Dots With The Freckles On Your Cheek (ao3) - twoheadlights (fizzfic)

Summary: He traces circles on Phil’s back now and sees a freckle right in the center. Phil’s open window always lets some light in and he’s practically basking in the pale moonlight to match his skin. Dan smiles to himself and traces a I Phil across his back, as if it was a secret he didn’t want Phil to know even though he did.

He shuts his eyes, feeling sleepiness finally hit him when Phil suddenly moves next to him and murmurs, “Love you too.”

Kairos (ao3) - uselessphillie

Summary: (greek, n.) - the perfect, delicate, crucial moment; the fleeting rightness of time and place that creates the opportune atmosphere for action, words, or movement.

Late Night Pancakes - phan-panda

Summary: Phil finds himself looking at his friend Dan in ways he never thought he would before when an impromptu drunken pancake session goes awry.

Like A Computer (ao3) - starboydjh

Summary: Dan’s brain is like a computer and needs to reboot itself sometimes. It just so happens that his brain needs to reboot when Dan’s home alone with Phil’s parents during their Christmas trip to the Lester home base.

May I Kiss You? - daniactuallysnuffledthatpopcorn

Summary: After finishing university Phil Lester goes on holiday to Greece to celebrate with some friends. There they meet a group of Italian tourists, one of whom catches Phil’s eye. Phil has ten days to win Daniel Howell’s attention.

Oh, We’re In Love, Aren’t We? - jilliancares

Summary: Dan and Phil have been dating a while, but Dan doesn’t believe in love.

Phil Lester & The Downfall of Dateable London Men - gorgeousdan

Summary: Phil’s a YouTuber who’s certain he’ll never find love. Dan sends penis enlargement emails and wants to change Phil’s mind.

Sheet-Stealer - ineverhadmyinternetphase

Summary: The five times Phil stole the bedsheets, and the one time Dan got there first.

Snapshots (ao3) - waveydnp

Summary: Little moments from a big tour.

Squish - adorkablephil

Summary: Dan gains some weight, but it doesn’t change how Phil sees him.

Things That No Longer Need Mention (ao3) - abriata

Summary: The kissing doesn’t stop.

Two weeks later, Dan has a hand in Phil’s hair and Phil’s hand on his spine and he basically can’t feel his mouth anymore, and they were supposed to have left for the BBC ten minutes ago.

Dan still has no idea why Phil is doing the kissing thing, but it’s definitely too late to ask now.

Wait For Me To Come Home - phloridas

Summary: The story of Dan and Phil, as told by their Starbucks sofa. (Or, the bits of it that the sofa could catch anyway.)

reblog.comment:
Links Last Checked: May 8th, 2019

Summary: Dan gains some weight, but it doesn’t change how Phil sees him.

Things That No Longer Need Mention (ao3) - abriata

Summary: The kissing doesn’t stop.

Two weeks later, Dan has a hand in Phil’s hair and Phil’s hand on his spine and he basically can’t feel his mouth anymore, and they were supposed to have left for the BBC ten minutes ago.

Dan still has no idea why Phil is doing the kissing thing, but it’s definitely too late to ask now.

Wait For Me To Come Home - phloridas

Summary: The story of Dan and Phil, as told by their Starbucks sofa. (Or, the bits of it that the sofa could catch anyway.)

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Question to you or your followers if you weren’t in phandom back then. Was 2012 really that bad? Honestly from what I’ve seen,...
question: Question to you or your followers if you weren’t in phandom back then. Was 2012 really that bad? Honestly from what I’ve seen, it doesn’t come across to me as the dark time people say it was. Dan was definitely angry and defensive with his blog, but also a lot of it seems pretty reasonable to me and like he was frustrated because of how people treated him and refused to believe what he said about phan.
answer:
I discovered Dan and Phil in 2013 so I wasn’t around for the ~Dark Days~ so maybe it was different to be seeing it in the moment. But from what I see looking back, it seems like… yeah. Dan in particular was being kind of an asshole. But, he was also dealing with a lot. His career was just taking off, people were making wild assumptions about him and refusing to listen to him when he addressed it, this was shortly after “the video” got leaked, there was the whole “likely undiagnosed mental illness” thing at play, and he would have been what? 21? So he’s just getting a taste of adulthood for the first time, trying to figure out how to navigate all of that confusing nonsense, probably still trying to figure himself out and who he is as a person, all while under the social media microscope. Yeah. I’d be an asshole too.

It’s so easy to look back on the days of the customer service blog and no homo Howell and see it as Dan lashing out for no reason. But when you put into perspective all of the shit he was dealing with, both on and offline, it makes a lot more sense. I’m as old now as Dan was then, and let me tell you, I do not think I’d be able to handle that situation gracefully.

summary: If it's a ditl I will cry! I love vlogs! So much!
question: If it's a ditl I will cry! I love vlogs! So much!
answer: I would enjoy vloggy content. But I’m not confident it’ll be a ditl. The whole “requested for years” thing makes me think it’s something he hasn’t done before. But hey, what do I know?
